title: Ranked Queues... Can not find mention of them being disabled or a reason why
body: Am i missing something? I cant find a notice that they are disabled anywhere.

replies.body:
Ranked queues were temporarily disabled during the login service incident this morning. This was to prevent people from hopping into a ranked match, disconnecting, then not being able to log back in and cause LP loss. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
